name: afwt-clean-ecommerce-mngr
description: Microservice in nodejs with express, it's main goal is to manage all the authentication, validations, DB Integrations and CRUD operations for a basic and simple e-commerce

scripts.copy:assets: [ -d assets ] && cp -r assets build/assets || echo 'Skipping copy: assets does not exist'
scripts.copy:scripts: [ -d scripts ] && cp -r scripts build/scripts || echo 'Skipping copy: scripts does not exist'
scripts.copy:secrets: [ -d secrets ] && cp -r scripts build/secrets || echo 'Skipping copy: secrets does not exist'
scripts.copy:prisma: [ -d prisma ] && cp -r scripts build/prisma || echo 'Skipping copy: prisma does not exist'
scripts.copy:all: npm run copy:assets && npm run copy:scripts && npm run copy:secrets && npm run copy:prisma
scripts.start:dev: npm run build && export DEBUG=afwt-clean-ecommerce-mngr:* && npm start
scripts.dev: nodemon --watch src -e ts,js --exec npm run start:dev
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:only
scripts.coverage: export $(cat test/.env-test | xargs) && nyc mocha --timeout 10000 --require ts-node/register 'test/**/*.spec.ts'
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test

author: AndresFWilT
